Class ErrorLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • festival.ErrorLog

  • public abstract class ErrorLog
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      private static int num_warnings 
      static java.lang.String SEVERITY_CRITICAL
      Critical error application cannot continue
      static java.lang.String SEVERITY_HIGH
      High error functionality affected may need to restart application
      static java.lang.String SEVERITY_LOW
      Low error little functionality affected
      static java.lang.String SEVERITY_MEDIUM
      Medium error some functionality affected application can still run correctly

    • Method Detail

      • printError

        public static void printError(java.lang.String msg,
              java.lang.String severity)
        Prints an error message to the screen
        Parameters:
        msg - Error message to be displayed
        severity - Severity of the error, CRITICAL, HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW

      • printInfo

        public static void printInfo(java.lang.String msg)
        Print basic information. This can be used as a warning to the user. Such as when they have not entered in a correct value. Or a value that they have entered cannot be found in the database.
        Parameters:
        msg - String message to print

      • get_number_of_errors

        public static int get_number_of_errors()
        Returns the number of errors/exceptions that the application has encountered. This method is used heavily in the test harness
        Returns:
        Integer number of errors thrown

      • get_number_of_warnings

        public static int get_number_of_warnings()
        Gets the number of warnings shown to the user. Every ErrorLog.printInfo will increase the warning count.
        Returns:
        Integer number of warnings
